page.title: 07Leisure Activities
page.content: Although{Auchtermuchty}is quite small, there are many{clubs}and {organisations.}Associated with the {Parish Church}and{St. Matthew's}are {Sunday School, Bible Class, Woman's {Guild and Men's Association.}For young people there are{Brownies, Guides, {Cubs, Scouts, Boys' Club, Gymnastics {Club, Youth Club and A.T.C.}Sporting groups include{Badminton, Bellvue {Football Club, Bowling Club, Bridge {Club, Pool and Darts Teams in pubs, {Homing Pigeons, Keep Fit, Slimming {Club and Yoga.}Ladies can join the {S.W.R.I}and for men there is the {Masonic Lodge. Arts and Crafts}are also represented by the{Festival {Society, the Theatre Group, the {S.W.R.I. Choir, the Drama Group and a {lace_ making Class.}Also Senior Citizens are looked after by the{Old {People's Welfare Committee.
